!-- String related to modules --> Services Browse, view, book or apply for our core services including training and industrial attachment. Browse services Advertisement Create or import a custom advertisement and we will help you advertise through our rich media sources. Start advertising Events View and book for events that have been advertised through our media sources. View events Help & feedback Get help or send your feedback, and get answers to your questions right away. Send feedback Enquiries Ask questions and get advice on Destiny features and operations. Send enquiry Contact Us Contact Destiny Connections Media via email, phone or event book for an appointment to visit the offices. Contact
Training & Attachment Request for industrial attachment and training services from Destiny. Request Service Redirection Need to be connected to other external services? Let us know what you need, we will be glad to help. Redirect
Visit Us We are situated next to Kenya Methodist University along Meru Maua road. Meru, Kenya. Visiting Appointment Call Us Reach us directly through the following lines: +254724156703 or +254790775100 Call Send Email Write us an email via Contact@destinyfm.co.ke Send mail
+254724156703 +254790775100 contact@destinyfm.co.ke
Visit website Account
Account & Settings
Can one get a receipt after making a booking ? No. The transaction is recorded in our databases all you have to do is present the transaction ID and it will be processed. Can i recover my user ID once i forget or lose it ? Yes it is possible, just send an email with your details and we will recover it for you.
No enquiries yet Get started by asking a question below. Ask something Clear Screen
